features: 24 pack of Energizer MAX AA Alkaline Batteries, Batteries AA Size
Energizer's longest-lasting MAX AA batteries provide dependable power - up to 50% longer lasting than EVEREADY GOLD in demanding devices
The power you depend on for your double A devices, from toys and flashlights to everyday items like remotes
These Energizer AA batteries hold power for up to 12 years in storage
Energizer MAX AA batteries are designed to protect your devices against damaging leaks for up to two years after fully used
body.description: Power the devices you love with Energizer MAX Alkaline AA Batteries. These Energizer batteries fuel the technology that helps you live, work and play, whether you need remote batteries, clock batteries, or backup batteries for your child's favorite toys and games. Energizer's #1 longest-lasting MAX, these double A batteries keep your favorite devices running longer. Powerseal Technology helps protect your devices against damaging leaks for up to two years after these AA Energizer MAX Batteries are fully used. With a shelf life of up to 10 years in storage, these long lasting batteries are ready to keep your devices operating when you need them most. Depend on the power of Energizer MAX AA Batteries to power your everyday electronics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Have used Duracell for years. Seems they have been losing charge faster than before. Switched to Energizer and they seem to hold charge longer. If this keeps up, I will buy them again.

reviews.reviewText: I use the batteries for many things around the house, including emergency flash and lantern lights, motion censure lights, tv remotes, etc. Have found the batteries elsewhere at a cheaper price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5.0 out of 5 stars Value priced, meets or exceeds description, works as advertised and is a value.
reviews.reviewText: I purchase several things on Amazon and was giving pretty in-depth reviews. From this point on, here's the new agenda…. if it works as advertised, is well made, meets or exceeds the description, is a value, and arrives in a fair amount of time, it will get a "star rating" equal to what my expectations were/are. If it doesn't meet these criteria, then I will most definitely and descriptively tell the short comings of the products and you as a consumer will not have to go through the trouble of buying the product without some background knowledge. If the sell pulls that item and relists under another description, I will put the exact same review on the seller's feedback page. Sellers have done this a couple of times in the past, and I was true to my word then as well as now. DR

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Quality and a good value, for the batteries we use the most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brace Yourself: The Energizer Battery - A Dark Comedy That Keeps Going... and Going... and Going!
reviews.reviewText: Ladies and gentlemen, get ready for a review that will have you laughing through the darkness with every twist and turn of the Energizer AA Batteries. This double A powerhouse is here to unleash a comedic storm of energy, leaving you in stitches while your devices keep going... and going... and going!Let's start with the quantity. A whopping 24 batteries in a single pack? It's like they're saying, "Hey, we know you've got enough devices to power a small town, so we'll supply you with enough batteries to keep them running till the end of days." It's a darkly hilarious invitation to become the battery provider for the apocalypse. Who needs flashlights when you can have an army of Energizer-fueled devices lighting up the night?But the comedy doesn't stop there. These Energizer AA Batteries are like the Energizer Bunny's mischievous cousins, with a wicked sense of humor. Just when you think your device is about to run out of juice, these batteries pull a comedic twist and keep it going. It's like they're playing a prank on you, whispering, "Nah, we're not done yet! You thought we were ordinary batteries, but we're here to defy your expectations and give your devices an endless comedic performance."And let's not forget the Max Alkaline power. These batteries have more energy than a hyperactive squirrel on a caffeine binge. They inject life into your devices, breathing new energy into toys, remote controls, and anything else that craves a comedic jolt. It's like they're the stand-up comedians of the battery world, ready to deliver punchlines of power to keep your devices entertained for hours on end.Now, here's where the dark comedy truly shines. Picture this: It's the middle of the night, and you're fumbling around in the dark, desperately trying to find a flashlight or a fresh battery. Panic sets in as you stumble over furniture, cursing your luck. Just when you're about to give up, you discover an Energizer AA Battery hidden in the depths of your drawer. It's like a comedic twist, a punchline to the chaos of the moment. You let out a relieved laugh, realizing that even in your darkest hour, these batteries have your back.So, if you're ready to embrace the dark comedy of battery power, the Energizer AA Batteries are your ticket to laughter and endless energy. With their hilarious quantity, unwavering endurance, and unexpected comedic twists, you'll be entertained for days on end. Just remember, laughter may be the best medicine, but the Energizer AA Batteries are the comedic fuel that keeps the show going... and going... and going! Or as that supposed to be coming, and coming and coming? ;)
